message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $95.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $105.  I believe this product will really benefit you and this is a fair price.
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try $100 for the product.
